title: W/D in Unit + Business Center + Gym + Brand New 2+2 in Santa Clarita
posting_body: ['Unit Availability: August 08, 2022', 'Situated on Main Street in the heart of Old Town Newhall in Santa Clarita, CA.', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'Community Amenities', '- Located on Main Street of Old Town Newhall, which Features a Variety of Retail, Restaurants, and Entertainment', '- Dedicated Bike Storage Room', '- Just a Three-minute Stroll to the Newhall Metrolink Laemmle Theatres (Opening in 2020)', '- “The Office” — Collaborative Workspace With Conference Table and Television', '- Convenient On-site Storage Spaces Available for Additional Charge', '- Luxer One Package Lockers', '- “The Gym” — Fitness Center with Cardio Equipment, Free Weights, and Dedicated Stretching/Yoga Area', 'Apartment Amenities', '- Modern Stainless Steel Appliances Include Side-by-side Refrigerator With Ice & Water Dispenser, Range, Dishwasher, and Microwave', '- Backlit LED Vanity Mirrors', '- Quartz Countertops With Subway Tile Backsplash', '- Spacious Walk-in Closets*', '- Wood Plank-style Flooring in Living Room, Kitchen, and Bathrooms', '- Smart Keyless Entry', '- Plush Carpet in Bedrooms and Closets', '- Private Balconies', '- NEST Thermostats', '- In-home Stackable Washer & Dryer', '- Linen Cabinets or Shelves*', '- Fully-equipped Kitchens With White Shaker Cabinetry, Open Shelves, and Upgraded Oil-rubbed Bronze Hardware Package', '- Pendant Lighting*', '- Barn Doors*', '- Window Treatments Include Horizontal Blinds and Roller Shades', '* With Select Apartment Homes', 'Pets Welcome with an Additional Deposit (Restrictions Apply).', 'Call for Details and Restrictions.', '24450 & 24480 Main Street', 'Santa Clarita, CA', 'Price & availability are subject to change.', 'Square footage may not be exact.']
